00040 #ifndef _uimenu_cpp
00041 #define _uimenu_cpp

00043 #include "uimenu.h"
00044 #include "uimenuwindow.h"

00051 namespace phys

00053     namespace UI
00054     {
00055         Menu::Menu(ConstString name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UILayer* Layer)
00056             : Widget(name,Layer),
00057               HideSubWindows(true)
00058         {
00059             Type = Widget::Menu;
00060             RelPosition = Vector2(0,0);
00061             RelSize = Vector2(0,0);
00062 
00063             ConstString NewName = name+"root";
00064             RootWindow = new MenuWindow(NewName,Position,Size,this,Parent);
00065             MenuStack.push_back(RootWindow);
00066         }
00067 
00068         Menu::~Menu()
00069         {
00070             delete RootWindow;
00071             MenuStack.clear();
00072         }
00073 
00074         void Menu::Update(bool Force)
00075         {
00076             if(!Force)
00077                 SubWidgetUpdate();
00078             MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00079             if(HoveredSubWidget)
00080             {
00081                 Button* button = HoveredSubWidget->GetHoveredButton();
00082                 if(button && State == MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING)
00083                 {
00084                     MenuWindow* MenWin = static_cast<MenuWindow*>(HoveredSubWidget);
00085                     MenuWindow* ChildMenWin = MenWin->GetWindowOfAccessButton(button);
00086                     if(ChildMenWin)
00087                     {
00088                         if(HideSubWindows)
00089                             MenuStack.back()->Hide();
00090                         MenuStack.push_back(ChildMenWin);
00091                         ChildMenWin->Show();
00092                         return;
00093                     }
00094                     else if(button == MenWin->GetBackButton())
00095                     {
00096                         MenWin->Hide();
00097                         MenuStack.pop_back();
00098                         if(!MenuStack.back()->IsVisible())
00099                             MenuStack.back()->Show();
00100                         return;
00101                     }
00102                 }
00103                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00104                 {
00105                     SubWidgetFocus = HoveredSubWidget;
00106                 }
00107             }
00108             if(SubWidgetFocus && (SubWidgetFocus != HoveredSubWidget))
00109             {
00110                 SubWidgetFocusUpdate(true);
00111             }
00112             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State && Force)
00113             {
00114                 SubWidgetFocusUpdate(Force);
00115             }
00116             if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00117             {
00118                 SubWidgetFocus = NULL;
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122         void Menu::SetVisible(bool visible)
00123         {
00124             if(HideSubWindows)
00125             {
00126                 MenuStack.back()->SetVisible(visible);
00127             }else{
00128                 for( std::vector<MenuWindow*>::iterator it = MenuStack.begin() ; it != MenuStack.end() ; it++ )
00129                 {
00130                     (*it)->SetVisible(visible);
00131                 }
00132             }
00133             Visible = visible;
00134         }
00135 
00136         bool Menu::IsVisible()
00137         {
00138             return Visible;
00139         }
00140 
00141         void Menu::Show()
00142         {
00143             if(HideSubWindows)
00144             {
00145                 MenuStack.back()->Show();
00146             }else{
00147                 for( std::vector<MenuWindow*>::iterator it = MenuStack.begin() ; it != MenuStack.end() ; it++ )
00148                 {
00149                     (*it)->Show();
00150                 }
00151             }
00152             Visible = true;
00153         }
00154 
00155         void Menu::Hide()
00156         {
00157             if(HideSubWindows)
00158             {
00159                 MenuStack.back()->Hide();
00160             }else{
00161                 for( std::vector<MenuWindow*>::iterator it = MenuStack.begin() ; it != MenuStack.end() ; it++ )
00162                 {
00163                     (*it)->Hide();
00164                 }
00165             }
00166             Visible = false;
00167         }
00168 
00169         void Menu::SetAutoHideSubWindows(bool AutoHide)
00170         {
00171             HideSubWindows = AutoHide;
00172         }
00173 
00174         bool Menu::CheckMouseHover()
00175         {
00176             if(MenuStack.back()->CheckMouseHover())
00177             {
00178                 HoveredSubWidget = MenuStack.back();
00179                 HoveredButton = HoveredSubWidget->GetHoveredButton();
00180                 return true;
00181             }
00182             HoveredSubWidget = NULL;
00183             HoveredButton = NULL;
00184             return false;
00185         }
00186 
00187         void Menu::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00188         {
00189             MenuStack.back()->SetPosition(Position);
00190         }
00191 
00192         Vector2 Menu::GetPosition()
00193         {
00194             return MenuStack.back()->GetPosition();
00195         }

00198         {
00199             MenuStack.back()->SetActualPosition(Position);

00203         {
00204             return MenuStack.back()->GetActualPosition();
00205         }

00208         {
00209             MenuStack.back()->SetSize(Size);

00224             return MenuStack.back()->GetActualSize();

00229             return RootWindow;

00233         {
